description.value: The purpose of this profile is to represent a pathology report issued by a diagnostic service provider to support the electronic exchange of the electronic exchange of health information between individuals, healthcare providers, and the My Health Record system infrastructure in Australia. This profile is intended to be capable of supporting reporting for all pathology disciplines (e.g. including microbiology, histopathology, cytology, blood transfusion) with the exception of genomics.

short.value: A pathology report in an Australian healthcare context

definition.value: A pathology report sent from the service provider to the requester, i.e. the results including any interpretation provided, for an individual‘s pathology test.

short.value: Classification of the report as laboratory + more specific discipline where available

comment.value: A fixed category denoting a laboratory report and supports handling and searching of reports. A second category to provide a finer grain of discipline, e.g. Haematology should be provided if possible.
